# **What’s Happening at the Museums in 2025**

**Museums will be Open June 6th – October 17, 2025**

**Mon, Tues, Fri 10am-2pm, Sat 10am-4pm**

Events happening year-round, see our [calendar](http://web.archive.org/web/20251202145813/https://museumsonthegreen.org/calendar/)

**Our office & research library** are open year around M-F 10am-3pm. For the research library, please make an appointment.

**Try our free family-friendly scavenger hunt the next time you’re near the Falmouth Village Green:** [VG Scavenger Booklet.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20251202145813/https://museumsonthegreen.org/wp-content/uploads/VG-Scavenger-Booklet-with-new-logo-formatted-for-website.pdf.pdf)

To book a special curated experience, rental, or tour, please reach out to our Executive Director, Rachel Lovett, at Rachel@museumsonthegree...
admission_text:
### Planning Your Visit –

**HOURS OF OPERATION:** The Museums will open for the 2025 Season on**June 6th to October 17th**.

**Museum Hours** :

**We will open for the 2025 Season through October 17th!**

Starting June 6th, 2025 our hours will be:

Monday, Tuesday, Friday 10-2, and Saturday 10-4

* Please note on Saturday August 23rd we will be open 10-2pm and will just have our Cultural Center and Museum Store open.

Please check out our events on our [calendar](http://web.archive.org/web/20250910105344/https://museumsonthegreen.org/calendar/) page.

## **ADMISSION FOR CAMPUS TOURS & EXHIBITS**

**FREE Admission** for the 2025 season in Celebration of the 250th Anniversary of the American Revolution! Admission to the Museums on the Green includes a guided tour of the 1790 Dr. Francis Wicks House, exhibit rooms in the c1730 Conant House, cannon shed, Hallett Barn Visitors Center, and Cultural Center.

Start your visit in the Hallett Barn Visitor Center at 55 Palmer Avenue, Falmouth.

Guided Tours of the 1790 Dr. Francis Wicks House are available on the hour, with the last tour starting one hour before closing.

Visitors can always tour the Colonial Gardens & Memorial Park during daylight hours anytime of year.

**Bus tours and groups larger than 10 must call ahead to ensure adequate staffing for their visit.**

**WALKING TOURS**

We offer some walking tours year-round, be sure to check both our calendar and walking tour page for more information. Starting again **June 6th, 2...
